projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: A full-stack application that helps users manage their tasks efficiently.
projects.challenges: Implementing secure user authentication and ensuring smooth performance with a large dataset.
projects.solutions: Utilized ASP.NET Identity for secure authentication and optimized database queries to handle large datasets efficiently.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A Blazor-based weather dashboard that fetches real-time weather data from an external API.
keyFeatures: Fetches and displays real-time weather data
projects.challenges: Integrating a third-party API and handling potential errors from the API responses.
projects.solutions: Implemented error handling and fallback mechanisms to ensure the app remains functional even when the API fails.

projects.title: AI-Powered Chatbot
projects.description: An AI-powered chatbot integrated into a web application, capable of answering user queries and performing simple tasks.
keyFeatures: Customizable and expandable with new intents
projects.challenges: Training the bot to understand a variety of user inputs and ensuring a smooth user experience.
projects.solutions: Used Azure Bot Service and integrated a natural language processing (NLP) model to enhance understanding and response accuracy.
